mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL , R.REPLY_ID , R.BOARD_ID R_BOARD_ID , R.EMAIL R_EMAIL , R.REPLY , R.CRT_DT R_CRT_DT , R.PARENT_REPLY_ID , B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.EMAIL B_EMAIL , B.CRT_DT B_CRT_DT , B.MDFY_DT , B.FILE_NAME , B.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , R_M.EMAIL M_EMAIL , R_M.NAME , R_M.POINT FROM REPLY R , BOARD B , MEMBERS B_M , MEMBERS R_M WHERE B.EMAIL = B_M.EMAIL AND R.EMAIL = R_M.EMAIL AND R.BOARD_ID = B.ID AND B.ID = #{boardId} START WITH R.PARENT_REPLY_ID = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR R.REPLY_ID = R.PARENT_REPLY_ID
